title: The New Brutalism
excerpt: Why concrete is reclaiming its throne in the 2026 digital skyline.

children.text: Brutalism was never about being 'brutal'; it was about 'béton brut'—raw concrete. In 2026, we are seeing this philosophy transition into web fragments and interface design.

title: Neural Interfaces
excerpt: The shift from screen-based interaction to thought-led creativity.

children.text: We are moving past the mouse and keyboard. The latency between thought and execution is finally collapsing.

title: Ghost in the Machine
excerpt: Exploring the 'haunted' nature of generative AI datasets.

children.text: Every AI model carries the ghosts of the artists it was trained on. This creates a strange, nostalgic loop in modern art.
